# TabletopInteraction.Value.Gesture.Chirality.right

**Case**

Indicates a right-handed gesture.

## Declaration

```swift
case right
```

## Handedness

- **TabletopInteraction.Value.Gesture.Chirality.left**: Indicates a left-handed gesture.
